content.raw: It runs. However, when I exit the responser/request example, if the responser exits first, it prints out an error message "I do not have a service call registered for topic [@@/haptix/gazebo/Update]". Looks like this is not the behavior on default (actually, branch fix_link_examples since default currently doesn't compile the examples)
